summary: An ordinance providing for the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 891 for the improvement of 6th Avenue West from McGraw Street to Howe Street, and certain portions of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, under Ordinance No. 10569 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
